title: Linked Identifier Attestation (Third-Party Certified)
description: An attestation where the attester (a trusted third party) asserts that the subject controls the linked identifier.

attester.description: CAIP-2 address or DID of the third-party entity making the assertion. This entity has verified the linkage between the subject and linkedId.

subject.description: CAIP-2 address or DID of the subject (typically a wallet) that is claimed to control the linked identifier.

linkedId.description: The identifier being claimed as controlled by the subject (e.g., a did:web, email address, or domain).

linkedIdType.description: Type or namespace of the linkedId being asserted.

method.description: Verification method used by the attester to confirm the subject's control of the linkedId.

issuedAt.description: Timestamp when the attestation was issued.

validUntil.description: Optional expiration timestamp after which the attestation is no longer considered valid.

attestationType.description: Optional classification of the attestation for filtering and indexing purposes.
